Items.text: It was a slow, but neccesary start.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: We will be studying and practicing many different aspects of combat in this class.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: You'll be fighting on different terrain, against different components, and using different methods!
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: And I hope that by the end of this school year, you will be able to handle youselves in any hostile situation.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: Or, God forbid, if you ever run into a supervillain...
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: Alright, that's all for now. Make sure you head to the cafeteria for lunch before your third class.
Items.name: Gym Teacher
